Package nzilbb.ag.util

Class SpanningConventionTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • nzilbb.ag.util.SpanningConventionTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<Graph,​Graph>, UnaryOperator<Graph>, GraphTransformer
    public class SpanningConventionTransformer
extends Object
implements GraphTransformer
    Transforms a text convention that spans possibly multiple annotations on a source layer into annotations on a destination layer.

    Annotations on sourceLayerId are scanned, and where a label matches the startPattern regular expression, it and subsequent annotation labels, until a label that matches the endPattern regular expression, are concatenated to form the label of an annotation on destinationLayerId. During concatenation, the start and end annotations are relabelled using destinationStartResult and destinationEndResult, respectively. The spanned annotation may or may not be deleted, depending on the value of deleteInSource. If they are kept, the start and end annotations are relabelled using sourceStartResult and sourceEndResult, respectively.

    Some examples:

    To convert a sequence of words of the form {word1 word2 ... wordn} into a comment annotation:

    • sourceLayerId: word
    • startPattern: {(.*)
    • endPattern: (.*)}
    • deleteInSource: true
    • destinationLayerId: comment
    • destinationStartResult: $1
    • destinationEndResult: $1
    So a sequence of words "here {pointing to head} and there" will end up being the sequence "here and there" with a comment annotation labelled "pointing to head" between "here" and "and".

    To extract the VP phrase from a sequence of words of the form [XP word1 word2 ... wordn]:

    • sourceLayerId: word
    • startPattern: [(.*)
    • endPattern: (.*)]
    • deleteInSource: false
    • sourceStartResult: null
    • sourceEndResult: $1
    • destinationLayerId: phrase
    • destinationStartResult: $1
    • destinationEndResult: null
    So a sequence of words "the fox [VP jumps over the dog]" will end up being the sequence "the fox jumps over the dog]" with a phrase annotation labelled "NP" spanning "jumps over the dog".
    Note that in this case, having sourceStartResult set to null indicates that the start source annotation should be deleted, and having destinationEndResult set to null inicates that the last annotation should not be concatenated to the destination label.
    Author:
    Robert Fromont robert@fromont.net.nz

        public SpanningConventionTransformer()
        Default constructor.

      • SpanningConventionTransformer

        public SpanningConventionTransformer​(String sourceLayerId,
                                     String startPattern,
                                     String endPattern,
                                     boolean deleteInSource,
                                     String sourceStartResult,
                                     String sourceEndResult,
                                     String destinationLayerId,
                                     String delimiter,
                                     String destinationStartResult,
                                     String destinationEndResult)
        Constructor from attribute values.
        Parameters:
        sourceLayerId - Layer ID of the annotations to transform.
        startPattern - A regular expression matching the label of the first source annotation in the span.
        endPattern - A regular expression matching the label of the last source annotation in the span.
        deleteInSource - Whether to delete the source annotations between the start and end source annotations (exclusive).
        sourceStartResult - The resulting label of the start source annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in startPattern, or be null to delete the start annotation.
        sourceEndResult - The resulting label of the end source annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in endPattern, or be null to delete the end annotation.
        destinationLayerId - Layer ID of the annotation created for each span.
        delimiter - Delimiter to insert between source labels when concatenting them to for the destination label.
        destinationStartResult - The resulting label appended to the destination annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in startPattern, or be null to not include the start annotation.
        destinationEndResult - The resulting label appended to the destination annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in endPattern, or be null to not include the end annotation.

      • SpanningConventionTransformer

        public SpanningConventionTransformer​(String sourceLayerId,
                                     String startPattern,
                                     String endPattern,
                                     boolean deleteInSource,
                                     String sourceStartResult,
                                     String sourceEndResult,
                                     String destinationLayerId,
                                     String destinationStartResult,
                                     String destinationEndResult)
        Constructor from attribute values. The delimiter used is the default.
        Parameters:
        sourceLayerId - Layer ID of the annotations to transform.
        startPattern - A regular expression matching the label of the first source annotation in the span.
        endPattern - A regular expression matching the label of the last source annotation in the span.
        deleteInSource - Whether to delete the source annotations between the start and end source annotations (exclusive).
        sourceStartResult - The resulting label of the start source annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in startPattern, or be null to delete the start annotation.
        sourceEndResult - The resulting label of the end source annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in endPattern, or be null to delete the end annotation.
        destinationLayerId - Layer ID of the annotation created for each span.
        destinationStartResult - The resulting label appended to the destination annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in startPattern, or be null to not include the start annotation.
        destinationEndResult - The resulting label appended to the destination annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in endPattern, or be null to not include the end annotation.

      • SpanningConventionTransformer

        public SpanningConventionTransformer​(String sourceLayerId,
                                     String startPattern,
                                     String endPattern,
                                     boolean deleteInSource,
                                     String sourceStartResult,
                                     String sourceEndResult,
                                     String destinationLayerId,
                                     String delimiter,
                                     String destinationStartResult,
                                     String destinationEndResult,
                                     boolean annotatePrevious)
        Constructor from attribute values.
        Parameters:
        sourceLayerId - Layer ID of the annotations to transform.
        startPattern - A regular expression matching the label of the first source annotation in the span.
        endPattern - A regular expression matching the label of the last source annotation in the span.
        deleteInSource - Whether to delete the source annotations between the start and end source annotations (exclusive).
        sourceStartResult - The resulting label of the start source annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in startPattern, or be null to delete the start annotation.
        sourceEndResult - The resulting label of the end source annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in endPattern, or be null to delete the end annotation.
        destinationLayerId - Layer ID of the annotation created for each span.
        delimiter - Delimiter to insert between source labels when concatenting them to for the destination label.
        destinationStartResult - The resulting label appended to the destination annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in startPattern, or be null to not include the start annotation.
        destinationEndResult - The resulting label appended to the destination annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in endPattern, or be null to not include the end annotation.
        annotatePrevious - Whether the destination annotation annotates the source token prior to the first matching source token (i.e. whether they should share start anchors).

      • SpanningConventionTransformer

        public SpanningConventionTransformer​(String sourceLayerId,
                                     String startPattern,
                                     String endPattern,
                                     boolean deleteInSource,
                                     String sourceStartResult,
                                     String sourceEndResult,
                                     String destinationLayerId,
                                     String destinationStartResult,
                                     String destinationEndResult,
                                     boolean annotatePrevious)
        Constructor from attribute values. The delimiter used is the default.
        Parameters:
        sourceLayerId - Layer ID of the annotations to transform.
        startPattern - A regular expression matching the label of the first source annotation in the span.
        endPattern - A regular expression matching the label of the last source annotation in the span.
        deleteInSource - Whether to delete the source annotations between the start and end source annotations (exclusive).
        sourceStartResult - The resulting label of the start source annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in startPattern, or be null to delete the start annotation.
        sourceEndResult - The resulting label of the end source annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in endPattern, or be null to delete the end annotation.
        destinationLayerId - Layer ID of the annotation created for each span.
        destinationStartResult - The resulting label appended to the destination annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in startPattern, or be null to not include the start annotation.
        destinationEndResult - The resulting label appended to the destination annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in endPattern, or be null to not include the end annotation.
        annotatePrevious - Whether the destination annotation annotates the source token prior to the first matching source token (i.e. whether they should share start anchors).

      • SpanningConventionTransformer

        public SpanningConventionTransformer​(String sourceLayerId,
                                     String startPattern,
                                     String endPattern,
                                     boolean deleteInSource,
                                     String sourceStartResult,
                                     String sourceEndResult,
                                     String destinationLayerId,
                                     String destinationStartResult,
                                     String destinationEndResult,
                                     boolean annotatePrevious,
                                     boolean closeGaps)
        Constructor from attribute values. The delimiter used is the default.
        Parameters:
        sourceLayerId - Layer ID of the annotations to transform.
        startPattern - A regular expression matching the label of the first source annotation in the span.
        endPattern - A regular expression matching the label of the last source annotation in the span.
        deleteInSource - Whether to delete the source annotations between the start and end source annotations (exclusive).
        sourceStartResult - The resulting label of the start source annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in startPattern, or be null to delete the start annotation.
        sourceEndResult - The resulting label of the end source annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in endPattern, or be null to delete the end annotation.
        destinationLayerId - Layer ID of the annotation created for each span.
        destinationStartResult - The resulting label appended to the destination annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in startPattern, or be null to not include the start annotation.
        destinationEndResult - The resulting label appended to the destination annotation, which may contain references to captured groups in endPattern, or be null to not include the end annotation.
        annotatePrevious - Whether the destination annotation annotates the source token prior to the first matching source token (i.e. whether they should share start anchors).
        closeGaps - Whether to close gaps in the source layer created by deleting span annotations, by setting the end of the previous annotation to the start of the following annotation.
